description: Charitable purpose of the charity. The Colorado office of the Secretary of State Division of Charity registers charitable organizations that solicit contributions in Colorado and their professional fundraisers. A charitable organization is a type of non-profit organization (NPO) that centers on philanthropic goals as well as social well-being (educational, religious, other activities serving the public interest or common good). Search for “sos-csi” for all other charities related datasets.
